title: Ed Miliband – 2014 Speech to GMB Congress
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Ed Miliband, the Leader of the Opposition, to the GMB Congress held in Nottingham on 12th June 2014.

[![edmiliband](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/edmiliband-214x300.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/edmiliband.jpg)
